dcterms:creator: Ting-Yun Chang
Yun-Nung Chen
dcterms:description: A dataset containing word definitions from the Oxford dictionary, used for evaluating contextualized word embeddings and their ability to capture sense-specific information.
dcterms:title: Oxford Dictionary Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mohammad Taher Pilehvar
Jose Camacho-Collados
dcterms:description: A dataset containing pairs of contexts sharing a target word, used to evaluate word sense disambiguation by determining if the word senses in the contexts are the same.
dcterms:title: Word-in-Context (WiC) Dataset
